name: @waylay/temperature
description:
Temperature sensor based on the API provided by Open weather
Please be aware that there are many cities in US that have the same name as the one in Europe, so it is always better to specify the country, example: Paris, France

States
  • Heat: temperature > 32
  • Warm: temperature > 20
  • Mild: temperature > 12
  • Cold: temperature > 0
  • Freezing: temperature <= 0
Properties
  • city (format: city, country)
RawData:
  • temperature
  • pressure
  • humidity
  • temp_min
  • temp_max
  • wind_speed
  • clouds_coverage
  • sunrise
  • sunset
  • longitude
  • latitude
  • name
  • condition (state)
  • icon
